title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Evidence-Based Competency Documentation Strategies for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science curriculum theories and basic assessment methods
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can classify students' inquiry competencies in science experiments into at least three measurable indicators using formative assessment tools
Learners can present at least two pieces of evidence linked to real science class contexts to validate the validity of assessment tasks
Learners can visualize student-specific assessment results and propose learning improvement directions using a digital portfolio system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
